dmca.title: [EV1-C1418966G] software piracy on your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----

Conversation: [EV1-C1418966G] software piracy on your servers

MIME element (text/plain)
you are hosting the biggest croatian software pirate (mp3's, microsoft
programs etc...) 
 
he is using PHP script to redirect all NON CROATIAN IP's to another web
page (if you need, i can provide you some croatian proxys so that you
can see real content). 
 
he also owns few "hosting providers" where he acts like a client so if
somebody goes to whois records he will see HIS hosting "company"
name-desert.net and croserver.com and www.desert-eagle-hosting.com and
they will report TO HIM.. 
 
you can see some screenshots here: 
 
http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/3889/amstel1nv2.gif
http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/7591/amstel2sa8.gif
